Posts.EditableText: in the Places & Objects box, you dont see your name.  But when a telnet user connect, it shows them as an Object instead of a Player, and underneath them you can see yourself, but it just doesnt show your name, so its blank.
Posts.HTML: in the Places & Objects box, you dont see your name.  But when a telnet user connect, it shows them as an Object instead of a Player, and underneath them you can see yourself, but it just doesnt show your name, so its blank.

Posts.EditableText: Yes, that's because if you try connecting via Telnet you don't get a chance to enter your name properly. There are many other things that don't work when you try connecting via Telnet, so... DON'T!
Posts.HTML: Yes, that's because if you try connecting via Telnet you don't get a chance to enter your name properly. There are many other things that don't work when you try connecting via Telnet, so... DON'T!
